title: Far Cry 2 PC Windows Game Full Game + Serial + Crack + PowerISO
description:
Far Cry 2 PC Game.

Type: Full Retail DVD copy
Language: English
Crack: YES
Serial: YES
Backup of original .exe: YES
Other: Includes a copy of PowerISO + Serial

Instructions:

1. Burn or mount with included PowerISO or extract to folder with WinRAR

2. Install game

3. Copy FarCry2.exe from Crack + Serial folder to 

C:/Program Files/Ubisoft/Far Cry 2/bin

4. Create a shortcut to desktop (if one wasn't automatically created)

5. Play the game
